data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The idea of this very simple module is to extend the use of
    Getopt::Long with files. The options are read from the file and
    inserted into @ARGV, and then Getopt::Long will parse them as usual.
    This method is inspired by some Debian tools that use such
    configuration files (dpkg).
